krikat kridawa thema karagena nipadawu prathama sinhala chithrapataya wana ‘sinhawalokanaya’ sandaha palapurudu githa pada rachakayeku wana sunil wimalawira wisin pada rachanaya kala mema githaya loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliya pawathwena mema wakawanuwe githalolinge awadhanayata yomu wi athi githayak lesa salakiya haki ya.“harima badu thunak” chithrapataye athulath wu em.es. pranandu samanga ranjani perera wisin gayana kala “obage ruwa magemayi” githaya pada rachanaya karamin gi pada rachanayata piwisi sunil “hudakala wiramayedi” (asanka priyamantha) “hitha pura mal” (amarasiri piris) saha “oya as piyana” (kithsiri jayasekara) wani janapriya gi pada rachana rasaka himikaru ya.chithrapata nishpadakawarayeku, thirakatha rachakayeku da wana sunil gi pada rachanayata wadi prawanathawak dakwana athara danata amathi madhya upadeshaka warayeku lesa katayuthu karayi.

kolambaa wishwawidyalaya yatathe pawathina, rajagiriye pihiti deshiya waidya widyayathanaye adhyayana katayuthawala niratha siyaluma shishyawange newasika gataluwa wisandanu laba athi namuth, kuli padanama matha labagath adu pahasukam sahitha paudgalika niwasawala newasika pahasukam salasa denu laba athi, ehi adhyayana katayuthuwala niratha shishyayange newasika gataluwata sthirasara wisandumak washayen idamak mila di gena newasikagarayak idi kirima sudusu bawa handunaganu laba thibe.
